## html
#  replace ';' with ';&#'
#  replace '\n' with ';\n&#'
#  (watch for first and last character of block)
#  add head and foot to html document

# html head
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head><meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8"></head>
<body><pre>

# html foot
</pre></body>
</html>


## useful list generated with lots of regex and http://symbolcodes.tlt.psu.edu/bylanguage/braillechart.html

2 5
3 6
7 8
